snippet: Dr. Moshe B. Mirilashvili, 66, was charged in federal court with writing over 10,000 medically unnecessary prescriptions for oxycodone from his Manhattan office.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column observes Dr Moshe B Mirilashvili of Washington Heights is accused in federal court with writing over 10,000 medically unnecessary prescriptions for oxycodone; notes authorities were tipped off by neighbors about possible drug operation, which involved two other doctors writing bad prescriptions.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Moshe B. Mirilashvili, 66, was charged in federal court with writing over 10,000 medically unnecessary prescriptions for oxycodone from his Manhattan office.

headline.main: A Doctor Who Denies He’s a Kingpin
headline.print_headline: A Doctor Who Denies He’s a Kingpin
